thread.title: Colabor Group Will Hold a Conference Call to Discuss its First Quarter 2018 Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Colabor Group Will Hold a Conference Call to Discuss its First Quarter 2018 Results
text:
BOUCHERVILLE, Quebec, April 25, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Colabor Group Inc. (TSX:GCL) (“Colabor” or the “Corporation”) will release its results for the first quarter ended March 24, 2018, before market open on Thursday, May 3, 2018. A conference call to discuss these results will be held on the same day, at 9:00 a.m. (Eastern Time).
Conference Call:
A live broadcast of the conference call will be available on the Company’s website, in the Investors section under Events and Presentations.
To participate (professional investment community only) or to listen to the live conference call:
Local participants (Toronto area), dial into (647) 788-4922 North-American participants, dial toll-free 1-877-223-4471
To listen to a recording of the conference call, please call 416-621-4642 or call toll-free 1-800-585-8367 and enter the code 2186754. The recording will be available as of Thursday May 3, 2018 at 11:00 a.m. until Thursday May 17, 2018 at 23:59 p.m.
About Colabor:
Colabor is a distributor and wholesaler of food and non-food products serving the foodservice market (cafeterias, restaurants, hotels, restaurant chains) in Quebec, Ontario and the Atlantic provinces, as well as the retail market (grocery stores and convenience stores). www.colabor.com
Further Information:
Colabor Group Inc.
Jean-François Neault, CPA, CMA, MBA
Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer
Tel.: 450-449-0026, ext. 1308
Fax: 450-449-6180

Source:Groupe Colabor Inc.
